item.title: Why Nepal has put on hold Gorkhas recruitment
item.description: Why does the Nepal government have reservations about India’s Agnipath scheme for recruitment in the armed forces? What about the Tripartite Agreement between India, Nepal and the UK?Why has Nepal postponed Agnipath recruitment rallies? The decision to postpone these rallies has been taken by the Nepalese government as it is of the opinion that this new form of entry into the Indian military is not covered under the Tripartite Agreement signed between Nepal, Indian and UK governments in 1947, soon after Indian independence.
